name: Alice, Lady of Lament
desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 "Lady of Lament" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each of the following effects of "Alice, Lady of Lament" once per turn. You can banish 1 Trap from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Tributed, or if this card in its owner's possession is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can add 1 Fiend monster whose combined ATK & DEF equal 2000 from your Deck to your hand, except "Alice, Lady of Lament".
